about_the_game:
Zorezdra is a sci-fi platformer/metroidvania set aboard a giant spaceship. A woman with unusual powers searches for the truth about her origins, and a way to finally free herself from her difficult past.

THE STORY OF ZOREZDRA

In a lonely galaxy, in a universe unlike our own, people speak of a great prophecy. As the age draws to a close, the galaxy will undergo a phenomenal transformation, granting incredible power to those within it. The time of fulfilment is approaching, and everyone looks forward to it with anticipation.

Almost everyone.

On an isolated space station, hidden away at the galaxy's edge, a mysterious woman lives in solitude. She's never known how she got there or why – none of what she can piece together seems to make any sense. All she knows for sure is that some in the galaxy hold a grievance against her, and only by staying out of their way has she maintained a delicate peace.

It cannot last. When the station is attacked without warning by an army of robotic reptiles, she is forced to flee everything she has ever known. What consequences will there be for revealing her existence to the galaxy she has learnt to fear – and what will be the future of Zorezdra...?

FEATURES

  • Retro-style action: Run, jump, fight and glide your way through a huge spaceship.

  • New powers: Enhance your character with an array of superhuman abilities.

  • Engaging story: Discover the complex truth about your character's backstory, and the galaxy she inhabits.
